meanings: (말·충고 등을) listen (to), follow, obey, take (one's advice), (Am) mind, (formal) heed
(효과가 있다) have an effect (on), be effective, work (for), act (on)

examples.korean: She tensed, hearing the strange noise again. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그 이상한 소리를 또 듣고 긴장했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
